name: growth-mulch
effect: Used on a patch of soil : Plantâ€™s growth stages will each last 25% less time. Dries soil out more quickly.

flavor_text: A fertilizer for growing Berries. However, it appears to be unsuitable for the soil in the Hoenn region and has no effect.
